column2: Şişmä) is an urban locality (a work settlement) and the administrative center of Chishminsky District in the Republic of Bashkortostan
column4: located near the Dyoma River. As of the 2010 Census

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Chishmy serves as the administrative center of Chishminsky District. As an administrative division
column3: it is incorporated within Chishminsky District as Chishminsky Settlement Council. As a municipal division
column4: Chishminsky Settlement Council is incorporated within Chishminsky Municipal District as Chishminsky Urban Settlement.
